item.title: Xbox Console Sales Drop 22%, Game Pass and First-Party Titles Drive 10% Rise in Overall Microsoft Gaming Revenue
item.description: Microsoft reported its latest 2025 quarterly earnings results Wednesday. The tech company’s gaming-specific sales reached $5.5 billion for the three-month period which ran April 1-June 30, up 10% from
